programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Punto Com
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 It's a busy day for ICE Supervisor Agent Tommy Kilbride. After capturing a dangerous PCP dealer, he's already searching for a fugitive known as "Punto Com" ("Dot Com" in Spanish).

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - The Ghost
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Supervisory Inspector Greg Holmes and Deputy Dennis Tait don't know it yet, but a cold case from Houston is about to get hot.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Moving Target
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 In 2008, a Dominican national violated probation and went into hiding and local authorities were unable to locate him.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Scarred for Life
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 Commander Lenny DePaul hasn't been back to his hometown of Utica, New York, in a long time.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Unthinkable
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Senior Parole Officer Vinny Senzamici and his team make it their priority to find a level three sex offender on the run. The fugitive sexually abused a six-year-old girl over a two-year period.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - One to Go
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 Commander Lenny DePaul and Deputy Michelle "Michy" Mendez receive a prominent, "ripped from the headlines" case out of the U.S. Marshals' office in Puerto Rico.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Family Secret
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Detective Roxanne Lopez has a full plate helping to clean up the crime in her New York City suburb when she pulls an urgent new case. A woman comes forward to tell Roxanne a heartbreaking story.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - The Ruse
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 After committing attempted murder in the United States, a Mexican gang member is deported back to his country. Soon after, federal authorities learn that he has slipped back into the U.S.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - City of Troy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 Senior Inspector Mike Woerner of the Albany Marshal's office has a lead on a "Most Wanted" fugitive in upstate New York. Allegedly the suspect participated in an attempted murder.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Predator Pursuit
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Senior Inspector Mike Romani is in the Sex Offender's Unit and is eager to rein in everybody that breaks the law. But for Mike, cases involving children are especially urgent.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Gun Store Heist
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 In Virginia Beach, Virginia, nearly 30 handguns were stolen after thieves broke into a gun store through the roof.

programme.title: Manhunters: Fugitive Task Force - Ticking Time Bomb
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 When Senior Officer Vinny Senzamici is assigned a parolee who's on the most wanted list, he knows he has a "ticking time bomb" on his hands.

programme.title: The First 48 - Life Snatched
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 22 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a middle-aged mother of four, shot to death in a random robbery outside a public storage facility.

programme.title: The First 48 - Silent Rage / Tainted Love
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 24 In Harris County, Deputy Jason Brown is called out on Easter Sunday to investigate the brutal shooting of a woman who was a school bus driver and mother of two. Meanwhile, Harris County Sergeant Sidney Miller takes on the murder of a young father.

programme.title: The First 48: Cut Down / 9-1-1 - Cut Down / 9-1-1
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 144 Det. Garcia is investigating the shooting death of a local homeless man. And after a minor injury, a woman makes a routine call to 911--the call becomes anything but routine when gunshots ring out in the background.

programme.title: The First 48: Body of Evidence - Body of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 146 When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miami's Biscayne Bay, Det. Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.title: The First 48 - Underworld
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a man found brutally beaten to death below a major interstate.

programme.title: The First 48: Schoolyard Revenge - Schoolyard Revenge
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 157 A twenty-nine-year-old man and his paralyzed mother are shot to death in their apartment.

programme.title: The First 48 - Life Snatched
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 22 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a middle-aged mother of four, shot to death in a random robbery outside a public storage facility.

programme.desc: Season 1, Part 1 of a 2-hour feature length film with soothing music which gently sweeps viewers on a journey to breathtaking destinations throughout Argentina, Bolivia, Canada, Chile, Mexico, and throughout California, Hawaii, Oregon, and Utah.

programme.title: Spirit Lake Relaxation - Spirit Lake Relaxation
programme.desc: Season 1, Relax for 3 hours at the gorgeous Spirit Lake, in Mount St Helen's Washington with this soothing dynamic nature film containing only the pure sounds of Nature!

programme.title: Northern Lights - Northern Lights
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Look up to the entrancing, spectacular, and magical light show of colorful Auroras Borealis brightening up the night's sky.

programme.title: Houhora Beach: New Zealand - Houhora Beach: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, The seaside hamlet of Houhora, New Zealand; the beaches that make this destination unforgettable.

programme.title: Nacpan Beach - Nacpan Beach
programme.desc: Season 1, Traveling to a beautiful stretch of cream-colored sand with swaying coconut palms and clear waters.

programme.title: Islands of Paradise - Yasawa Islands, Fiji
programme.desc: Season 1, The beautiful Yasawa islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Good Morning - Pa'ako Beach, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new day dawns on Hawaii's Pa'ako beach.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Serial Rapist of Sacramento
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 316 The story of a sexual predator and his horrific attacks, how he managed to evade the law for years and how determined investigators, forensic technology and a legal loophole finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Chris Hansen interviews a convicted killer in order to understand why he and his brother kidnapped an elderly Texas woman, drove around and showed her off as their "prize" before assaulting her and tossing her into a river where she drowned to death.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 When Sheila Davalloo becomes the 'odd woman out' in a love triangle, she kills her rival. The case remains a mystery for months until Sheila tries killing her husband and a dedicated detective finally puts the pieces together of this sordid story.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fallen / Texas Burning (#26)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In Miami, a young man's body is found next to a high-rise, a victim of an apparent suicide. But the investigation takes a twist when Sgt. Joe Schillaci discovers signs of a struggle on the victim's body.

programme.title: The First 48 - Murder in the Driveway / Double Shooting in the Beans (#25) (2005)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 In a case of young man shot dead in Little Haiti, Miami Detective Ervens Ford and his team learn the suspected killer is a member of a notorious gang. The team must hunt him down, before he flees the country.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Murder Rap / New Year's Terror
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 In Cleveland, Ohio, two murders rock the city. A young man leaves gang life behind to dedicate himself to ending the violence in his west side neighborhood. But soon after, he's shot dead. Once in custody, the killers shock the police with their motive.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Twice Told Tale
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 It's a murder case that spans twelve years and centers on one 911 call. The victim says a name in the last moments of her life--will that be enough to convict her alleged killer.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Rookie
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 In Cleveland, a beloved son and father are shot to death during a robbery. A single eyewitness comes forward to identify two suspects, both members of a notorious gang.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Blackout
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Dallas homicide detective Robert Arredondo was called to his first case as lead detective on in November of 2007.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Vampire Teens
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 34 A group of high school outcasts is on the run through the southeastern United States after their leader commits a savage double homicide.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Sadist of San Luis Obispo
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 35 A predator on early release from prison turns the quiet town of San Luis Obispo into a hunting ground, preying on young, unsuspecting, college age women.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Bladerunner
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 36 An Olympic hero shoots his girlfriend at his home in the middle of the night. Has he mistaken her for an intruder or is it all part of a precisely calculated plot to get away with murder?

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Gainesville Ripper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 37 An evil ex-con on the run for attempted murder sets up camp in Gainesville, Florida. But, he’s not satisfied just hiding out.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Grifting Grannies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 33 Investigators suspect two grannies are behind a twisted insurance scam, but they have to find the evidence that ties them to a hit-and-run.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Snake Charmer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 37 A Texas rodeo star is devastated when he comes home to find his beauty-queen wife dead with multiple rattlesnake bites on her feet.

programme.title: Pluto TV True Crime - Pluto TV True Crime
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 While returning to the Enterprise aboard the shuttlecraft, Kirk, Spock, McCoy and a seriously ill Federation diplomat find themselves kidnapped by an energized cloud.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Journey To Babel
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Tensions run high when the Enterprise transports ambassadors to the Babel conferences.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Friday's Child
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The Enterprise crew becomes embroiled in a local power struggle on a tribal planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Deadly Years
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 A landing party, including the command staff, is infected with a disease that causes rapid aging and senility.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Obsession
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 The Enterprise must deal with a creature from Kirk's past that feeds on human blood.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Wolf In The Fold
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 Kirk and the Enterprise computer become detectives after Scotty is accused of murdering women on a pleasure planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Trouble With Tribbles
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 The Enterprise is overrun by furry creatures while tangling with Klingons and bureaucrats.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Gamesters Of Triskelion
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 Kirk, Chekov, and Uhura are kidnapped and forced to participate in a series of gladiatorial games.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - A Piece Of The Action
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Kirk investigates a planet with an Earth-like 1920's gangster culture.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Immunity Syndrome
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 The Enterprise encounters a gigantic energy draining space organism that threatens the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - A Private Little War
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Kirk becomes involved in an arms race when the Klingons equip a native people with superior weaponry.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Return To Tomorrow
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The U.S.S. Enterprise tracks a mysterious SOS to an ancient planet presumed long dead.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Patterns Of Force
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 Enterprise is sent to planet Ekos to investigate a disappearance of Federation historian John Gill.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E5 - The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Chiana discovers a recording with Moya's original Pilot. After seeing the recording and realizing Aeryn was involved, Pilot orders Aeryn to leave Moya

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E6 - Picture If You Will
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 Chiana buys a picture in a store, which is more than it seems. The picture changes and shows Chiana what will happen to her.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear - The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Alien Psychosis - Alien Psychosis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A veteran returns home to his pregnant wife after being wounded in combat. Suffering from PTSD, Ryan begins to see strange beings in his house at night, caused by a sinister presence, which has been haunting him in his nightmares.

programme.title: Abduction - Abduction
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Quinn, a member of a SWAT unit, steps out of a park fountain in an Asian city with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he pieces together clues from his past, he vaguely recalls his young daughter, who has been kidnapped.

programme.title: Glitch - Glitch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Three geeks invent a cellphone chip that will allow users to telepathically access other people's minds. When they try them out on themselves, the prototypes reveal a very dangerous side effect.

programme.title: Going Postal - Going Postal
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Moist von Lipwig is a skilled con artist who was going to be hanged for his crimes but is saved at the last moment by Patrician Havelock Vetinari.

programme.title: Going Postal - Apparitions
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The adventure continues as Moist attempts to introduce postage stamps to Ankh-Morpork and Reacher Gilt sets a banshee assassin on the unsuspecting postmaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tattoo
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Chakotay is stranded on a planet inhabited by natives with ties to his ancestors.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Cold Fire
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Kes makes contact with Ocampa spacefarers and the female Caretaker, who may have the power to send the crew home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Maneuvers
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The theft of a transporter module by Kazon forces thrusts Chakotay into an explosive confrontation with his traitorous former lover Seska.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resistance
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 Janeway must escape from a city under siege by the Mokra, a brutal regime determined to crush the growing resistance movement against it.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prototype
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 After Torres reactivates a humanoid robot, she's drawn into a war between robotic enemies.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alliances
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 Hoping to strengthen Voyager's strategic position in the quadrant, Janeway reluctantly seeks an alliance with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Threshold
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Paris makes history by becoming the first person to cross the transwarp threshold, but could pay for the achievement with his life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Meld
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 Unable to come up with a logical motive for a shipboard murder, Tuvok performs a mind-meld with the perpetrator that brings out Tuvok's "killer instinct."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dreadnought
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Torres races against time to stop a deadly self-guided missile on a collision course with disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Death Wish
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 A rebel Q escapes from incarceration and demands asylum on Voyager so he can commit suicide.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Lifesigns
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 The Doctor falls in love with a Vidiian woman stricken by the deadly Phage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Investigations
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Neelix helps smoke out the crewmember who has been passing Federation secrets to the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Deadlock
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A space anomaly generates a duplicate Voyager and crew, but only one ship can survive an assault by Vidiian invaders.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: MST3K: Time Chasers - MST3K: Time Chasers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A college professor and a reporter go through time in a modified light plane to stop a corporation from using his invention to accidentally create a dystopian future.

programme.title: MST3K: The Creeping Terror - MST3K: The Creeping Terror
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster, and parody Love, American Style (1969).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell - Mitchell
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent - Lost Continent
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Moon Zero Two - Moon Zero Two
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The crew stages their own moon landing pageant as they watch the film Moon Zero Two about an astronaut hired to capture an asteroid made of sapphires.

programme.title: MST3K: The She-Creature - MST3K: The She-Creature
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The SOL crew is subjected to a dark, dreary tale of hypnotism, murder, and chesty amphibians.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas - I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.

programme.title: The National Tree - The National Tree
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A man (Andrew McCarthy) and his son (Evan Williams) embark on a cross-country road trip to transport a Christmas tree to Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot - The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An upscale, urban family that can't seem to get along gets stranded in a remote, impoverished lumber town two days before Christmas. Stars Lauren Holly and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: For Love & Honor - For Love & Honor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a by-the-book army veteran takes over as commandant at a military academy, he instantly squares off with the school's new Dean of Academics. But when they are forced to work together to help save the school, sparks fly.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Cupid & Cate - Cupid & Cate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Enigma
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Solitudes
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Tin Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Upon landing on Planet PX3 989, the mysterious alien Harlan renders the SG-1 team unconscious. After waking and returning to Earth, they find that their spirits and minds have been transferred to androids. Can the team regain their bodies and souls?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - There But For The Grace Of God
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 A mysterious mirror transports Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) to another dimension. Suddenly he finds himself on an alternate Earth that is under attack from the Goa'uld. Can he return to his dimension and save the world?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Politics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 Only Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) knows of the Goa'uld plans to invade Earth. But no one takes his warnings seriously - in fact, this time the authorities have chosen to terminate the costly Stargate program and close the gate forever.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Within The Serpent's Grasp
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 To stop the Goa'uld invasion, the SG-1 team disobeys orders and transports itself to the Goa'uld attack headquarters. Landing amidst preparations for an all-out strike on Earth, the way home is blocked. Can the team avert disaster and save humanity?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 When a fleet of Goa'uld warships launches a surprise attack, the SG-1 team uses the Stargate to board an enemy ship with enough explosives to destroy the alien force. But the team's capture suddenly turns their objective into a suicide mission!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - In The Line Of Duty
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 On a daring mission to rescue victims of an interplanetary attack, Carter's body is inhabited by a Goa'uld. And now that Carter has brought the demon back to Earth inside her, the SG-1 team must find a way to destroy it....without destroying Carter!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - No Man's Land
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Misbegotten
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Irresistible
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 The team comes across a small village with a revered leader. Beckett soon becomes so enamored by his host he brings him to Atlantis. But soon, McKay discovers that Lucius is using some sort of pheromone to enchant those around him.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Sateda
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 Exploring a village, the team is suddenly attacked and taken prisoner as Ronon had unknowingly lured the Wraith there. The villagers set Sheppard and Teyla free, who mobilize a strike force. When they return, the village has been devastated.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Progeny
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Dr. McKay discovers a reference to an abandoned Ancient testing site. At the site, the team discovers a vast metropolis supporting millions of Ancients. Eager to create an alliance, Weir is shocked when their leader Oberoth refuses the offer.
